modName: PC Headtracking Witcher 3 Yennefer of Vengerberg voicepack
summary: This is an addon voicepack for HHaley's PC Headtracking mod using the voice Yennefer of Vengerberg from CDPR's The Witcher 3. Some files in the "Breath"-folder are from Jo Wyatt's Ciri performance in "Witcher 3." Some of the melee combat grunts are from the Skyrim female high-elf voice.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]FcogCjLymeI[/youtube][/center]

"A blinding flash materialized into a transparent sphere, and inside it loomed a shape, assuming contours and shapes at frightening speed. Dandelion recognized it at once. He knew those wild, black curls and the obsidian star on a velvet ribbon. What he didn't know and had never seen before was the face. It was a face of rage and fury, the face of the goddess of vengeance, destruction and death." -[i]Time of Contempt[/i] by Andrezj Sapkowski.

Be the Baddest Witch in the Northern Kingdoms with this Yennefer of Vengerberg add-on voicepack for HHaley's PC Head Tracking and Voice Type mod. (Lilac and Gooseberries not included).

Requirements:

HHaley's PC Head Tracking and Voice Type and its requirements: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?


Recommended:

Mod Organizer (for easy installation): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?

Witcher 3 Female Armors: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007

Any Witcher 3 racemenu presets and/or appearance mods.

Any magic mod that adds cool new spells to the game.

Unicorn: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13606


Directions:

Overwrite PC Head Tracking with this mod, preferably by placing it below PC Head Tracking in Mod Organizer's load order.

Follow HHaley's instructions for activating and using custom player voices in the MCM.


Special Thanks:

CDPR, for making the Witcher 3 and granting permission to modders to make use of it's assets.

Denise Gough, who voiced Yennefer in The Witcher 3.

HHaley, for making that wonderful PC Headtracking and Voice Type mod.
author: ArgonianSoldier
